summary: When Pa wins a jingle-writing contest, he and Ma head for New York City. They they get in trouble with gangsters when they lose some stolen money which they had already agreed to deliver to one of the thugs.
cast: Marjorie Main|Percy Kilbride|Richard Long|Meg Randall|Gregg Martell|Charles McGraw|Kathryn Givney|Jim Backus|Elliott Lewis|Paul McVey|Bert Freed|Hal March|Barbara Brown|Ray Collins|Lester Allen|Leon Belasco|Dale Belding|Stanley Blystone|Leonard Bremen|Margaret Brown|George Calliga|Jack Chefe|Charles Coleman|Lynn Craft|Helen Dickson|Paul Dunn|Diane Florentine|Bess Flowers|Slim Gaut|Joe Gilbert|Dick Gordon|Maurice Gosfield|George Hoagland|Teddy Infuhr|Jackie Jackson|Sherry Jackson|John James|Larry Keating|Douglas Kennedy|Donald Kerr|Mike Lally|Donna Leary|Rex Lease|Peter Leeds|Wilbur Mack|John Marley|Beverly Mook|Charles Morton|Forbes Murray|William Newell|William H. keywords: gangster|stolen money|new york city|exercise bicycle|fish out of water
title: Ma and Pa Kettle Go to Town
